Header: STF officer shoots himself while on duty near Temple Trees
Content: A security officer attached to the Special Task Force has committed suicide by shooting himself with his weapon. The security was on duty at the main entrance checkpoint at Temple Trees. He was quickly rushed to the Colombo National Hospital. However he had succumbed to injuries. The incident had taken place this morning The deceased STF officer has been identified as a 30-year-old police constable. The police suspect the deceased committed suicide over an issue involving a romantic relationship.
